featured.text: The “Cups and Balls” trick has been performed for about 1,700 years.
The “Cups and Balls” trick which he was particularly good at is still performed by magicians all over the world today.

definition.zh_def: 杯子，通常用來盛飲料的容器，通常有把手。
definition.en_def: Cups are small, typically cylindrical containers used for drinking beverages, often with a handle.
definition.example: She poured the tea into the cups.
